subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: This weekend at AT&T Park, the Dodgers and Giants meet for the first time since the Dodgers’ industry-rattling trade last month, with the Giants holding a four-and-a-half-game lead.
snippet: This weekend at AT&T Park, the Dodgers and Giants meet for the first time since the Dodgers’ industry-rattling trade last month, with the Giants holding a four-and-a-half-game lead.
